name: Break Into
description:
A game redesign of Pong (where you have to outsmart your oponents and get the ball past them) with elements of Break Out (you have to break all the bricks to level up!), hence Break Into!

1-player mode (player vs computer) - beat the computer and get past it to break the bricks!

2-player mode (collaborative) - join forces to break all bricks and get the highest score!

Made with Processing.
